product_name: Showers Pass Storm Bike Pants - Men's
long_description: The Showers Pass Storm pants let you be prepared without breaking the bank. Toss this fully waterproof emergency piece in your pack or pannier for unexpected storms. Fully-taped waterproof fabric keeps the wind and rain out. 2 specially angled rip-and-stick cinch straps keep pant legs away from chain and crank. Elastic waist with drawstring and cordlock secures the fit. Zippered back pocket secures a few small items. Reflective trim boosts your visibility in low light. Showers Pass Storm pants come with a mesh stuff stack.
short_description: The Showers Pass Storm pants let you be prepared without breaking the bank. Toss this fully waterproof emergency piece in your pack or pannier for unexpected storms.
